titleStmt.title: Prælium & præmium. The Christians warre and rewarde A sermon preached before the Kings maiestie at VVhitehall the 3. of May. 1608. By Daniell Price Master of Arts of Exeter Colledge, and chapleyn in ordinarie to the prince
titleStmt.author: Price, Daniel, 1581-1631.

notesStmt.note: Dedication to the Archbishop of Canterbury.

"The dedication implies that the book took four days to print (?), and claims to be the first from the University Press since the archbishop (Richard Bancroft) became Chancellor (23 Apr. 1608)."--Madan, Oxford Books I, p. 71 ʻ.
Page 15 misnumbered 5; 25-28 missing; text is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
